mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE( doc_number, -- 문서번호 doc_apr_approver, -- 결재자 명 doc_apr_state, -- 결재 상태(승인, 반려, 보류, 대기 등) doc_apr_seq -- 결재 순번 ) VALUES ( #{docNumber}, #{docAprApprover}, #{docAprState}, #{docAprSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT doc_number, -- 문서번호 doc_apr_approver, -- 결재자 doc_apr_comment, -- 결재 의견 doc_apr_state, -- 결재 상태(대기, 승인, 반려) doc_apr_type, -- 결재 유형 doc_apr_date, -- 결재일자 doc_apr_seq -- 결재 순번 FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_apr_approver = #{docAprApprover} AND doc_apr_state = '대기'
SELECT doc_number, doc_apr_approver, doc_apr_comment, doc_apr_state, doc_apr_type, doc_apr_date, doc_apr_seq FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} ORDER BY doc_apr_seq
SELECT doc_apr_approver, doc_apr_state FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} AND doc_apr_state = '대기' ORDER BY doc_apr_seq FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT doc_number, doc_apr_approver FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER USING(doc_number) WHERE doc_apr_approver = #{empId}

SELECT doc_number, doc_apr_approver, doc_apr_comment, doc_apr_state, doc_apr_type, doc_apr_date, doc_apr_seq, doc_apr_proxy FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} ORDER BY doc_apr_seq

SELECT DISTINCT A.doc_number FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER USING(doc_number) WHERE doc_apr_approver = #{empId}) WHERE doc_apr_state = '대기') A LEFT OUTER JOIN document_approval_line B ON (a.doc_number = b.doc_number AND a.doc_apr_seq < b.doc_apr_seq) ORDER BY a.doc_number

SELECT DISTINCT A.doc_number FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER USING(doc_number) WHERE doc_apr_approver = #{empId}) WHERE doc_apr_state = '대기') A LEFT OUTER JOIN document_approval_line B ON (A.doc_number = B.doc_number AND A.doc_apr_seq < B.doc_apr_seq) WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE C WHERE A.doc_number = C.doc_number AND C.doc_apr_seq = A.doc_apr_seq - 1 AND C.doc_apr_state IN ('대기', '위임', '보류')) ORDER BY A.doc_number
SELECT DISTINCT doc_apr_seq FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} ORDER BY doc_apr_seq DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT doc_number, doc_apr_approver, doc_apr_comment, doc_apr_state, doc_apr_type, doc_apr_date, doc_apr_seq, doc_apr_proxy FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} AND doc_apr_seq = #{docAprSeq}

SELECT DISTINCT doc_number FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_FOLDER c USING (doc_number) ORDER BY doc_draft_date) a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE b USING (doc_number) WHERE a.doc_apr_approver = #{empId} AND a.doc_apr_status not in('폐기', '회수')
SELECT doc_apr_seq FROM DOCUMENT_APPROVAL_LINE WHERE doc_number = #{docNumber} AND doc_apr_state IN('대기', '보류') ORDER BY doc_apr_seq FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
